tool_description: Find the sentiment of a certain text. Returns AI-calculated comparative score (from -5, very negative, to 5, very positive). Also returns positive & negative words.
name: Text Sentiment API
title: Text Sentiment API

api_list.name: List Endpoints (Can be used as an endpoint health-check)
api_list.description:
This endpoint lists the possible endpoints to connect to.

Alias: /api/sentiment
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://text-sentiment-api1.p.rapidapi.com/api"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "text-sentiment-api1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://text-sentiment-api1.p.rapidapi.com/api"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "text-sentiment-api1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
